Comment.value:
How to Use: During race selection select your base race, then click the subrace box and type in EXACTLY the name as it is in the syntax prompt below.

Subraces - Gnome


Svirfneblin

Syntax: Gnome-svirfneblin

Stats: 
+2 Dexterity, +2 Wisdom 

Special Ability: 
When not in sunlight the Svirfneblin can become like the darkness he knows so well. One time per day the Svirfneblin can use Darkness to hide himself granting him 2 SR every rank in concentration to a max of 80SR and 10 + 1 % conceal every rank in hide to a max of 60%. Duration: 1 round per 6 levels.

Light Sensitive: 
-2 ab/-4 ac in outdoor areas during daylight hours.



Whisper Gnome

Syntax: Gnome-whisper

Stats: 
–2 Strength, +4 Dexterity, +2 Intelligence 

Skills: 
+10 Hide, +10 Move Silently, +5 Tumble

Feats: 
Defensive Roll, Sneak attack +5d6

Special Ability: 
(Displacement): 3 times per day the Whisper Gnome can use his/her mastery of stealth to gain 10 +1% conceal per rank in hide (max 40)
